metadata.description:
This is an example package file for the soundsgoodman repository. It installs a ReaScript that prints "Hello World!" in REAPER's scripting console.
Replace this description with your package's documentation. Markdown-like formatting is supported in ReaPack's UI.

ReaPack index for the soundsgoodman repository.
Replace this repository description (shown in ReaPack's "About this repository") with your own README or documentation text.
